fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: Horizon Europe, Structural Funds, Culture Programme, Creative Europe, Enterprise / Tourism
goals__remit: People&Ideas is a European consultancy based in Brussels and active in 7 European countries. It brings ideas and Policy together in EU Policy advocacy, association support, heritage networks, historical tourism, event organisation, copywriting, writing and photography. It needs for this regular access to EU institutions,  among which specially the European Parliament to consult with MEPs and supporting services, and with the European Commission services and the services of the Committee of the Regions.
relevant_communication: General meetings, congresses, workshops, board meetings, policy follow-up, newsletters, network actions, brochures, European action Days (European Bunker Day, European Fortess Day)
